title: section 31(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (State Authority) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (state authority) order 2023

title: section 31(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act
heading: 2. The Approved Housing Bodies Regulatory Authority is prescribed for
text_raw:
2. The Approved Housing Bodies Regulatory Authority is prescribed for 
the purposes of paragraph (j) of the definition of “State authority” in section 
31(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 
(No. 23 of 2014). 

The Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage consents to the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 May, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 May, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [262] 3
